issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I'm getting a lot of those Mesh too large errors on iPhone since iOS6. (both on Simulator and on Device (4S) )

Although those errors are generated on the console, the Map is working fine. I'm worried with possible bugs and leaks related to this error.

It seems that the new Maps is generating those but I wasn't able to pinpoint the exact cause. Any hints?

Sample errors:

2012-10-10 19:53:10.483 CashMe[87858:5313] MESH TOO LARGE!!! VKRoadTile: Too many road points for tile 758.1162.11 (512)

2012-10-10 19:53:10.570 CashMe[87858:5313] MESH TOO LARGE!!! VKRoadTile: Too many road points for tile 758.1161.11 (512)
fields.summary: MESH TOO LARGE!!! VKRoadTile: Too many road points for tile

comments.body: Please provide a reproducible test case I will re-open the issue. Thanks.

I've set this to resolved so that the issue can now be edited to provide more info.
Thanks,
Daniel

Ygor - since we have not heard back from you since you reported this, I am assuming the issue has been fixed. Therefore, I am closing it. Feel free to open new issues if you run into some bugs/features.
